text: ANKARA Turkish Defence Minister Hulusi Akar told Russian counterpart Sergei Shoigu in a phone call Monday that Armenian forces must immediately be removed from Azeri lands they occupy and halt attacks on civilians, Turkeys ministry said.Azerbaijan would not wait another 30 years for a solution to the conflict and Turkey supported the Azeri offensive to retake its occupied lands, the defence ministry said in a statement after the call.On Monday, Azeri and Armenian forces accused each other of launching new attacks in and around the Nagorno-Karabakh region, days after agreeing a Russian-borkered a humanitarian ceasefire intended to stop the heaviest fighting over the enclave for more than 25 years.
